Class AbandonedStationState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.AdventureState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.AbandonedStationStates.AbandonedStationState
public class AbandonedStationState extends AdventureState
Represents the state in which a player is presented with an AbandonedStation adventure card.

The player can either accept the card — if they have enough crew members — and proceed to the ChooseMaterialStation state to collect resources, or decline it and pass the opportunity to the next player. If all players decline, the game transitions to the IdleState.

  • Method Details

    • acceptAdventureCard

      public void acceptAdventureCard(String username)
      Handles the logic when the current player accepts the AbandonedStation card.

      The player must have enough crew members to board the station. If so, the game transitions to the ChooseMaterialStation state. Otherwise, an error is raised. Multiple acceptances are not allowed.

      Overrides:
      acceptAdventureCard in class AdventureState
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player attempting to accept the card.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the username is invalid, the card is already accepted, or the player has insufficient members.
      IllegalArgumentException - if it's not the player's turn.

    • declineAdventureCard

      public void declineAdventureCard(String username)
      Handles the logic when the current player declines the AbandonedStation card.

      If there are other players waiting, the state remains unchanged and the next player is prompted. If all players have declined, the game returns to the IdleState.

      Overrides:
      declineAdventureCard in class AdventureState
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player declining the card.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the username is invalid.
      IllegalArgumentException - if it's not the player's turn.
